item.title: Ancient Blade [Scaled Version] + Download and In-game footage
item.dc:creator: @Eyfia Eyfia
item.description:
@Eyfia wrote:

kirikugi:

Also…do not do Alot of Tracing…you need to get into the habbit of using prims…i do belive CJ has a tut on it because if you do alot of Tracing you will be like me…not a damn clue how to use prims(using prims can result in a cleaner wireframe and model)

Ou, thanks for this.

Read full topic

Also…do not do Alot of Tracing…you need to get into the habbit of using prims…i do belive CJ has a tut on it because if you do alot of Tracing you will be like me…not a damn clue how to use prims(using prims can result in a cleaner wireframe and model)

item.source: Ancient Blade [Scaled Version] + Download and In-game footage

item.title: Ancient Blade [Scaled Version] + Download and In-game footage
item.dc:creator: @Eyfia Eyfia
item.description:
@Eyfia wrote:

kirikugi:

the scaled version is great…well better than the original…dnt feel bad if people flame you of say u suck or any of that stuff because when i first started out…i could never get a good comment and now i barley get flamed at all!..but a word of advise…take more time on your models…say 20-30 minutes you will see a huge difference and experiment with the knife and mat tools you will see a big difference as well…and to avoid less flaming NEVER!! and i meen NEVER post recolors because 80% of Mopar will flame the hell out of you…well i wish you best of luck and i will keep an eye out on your models to see your improvement!

Well thanks! This model took me almost 2 hours… And for next I’m planning something better.

Read full topic
